uk.co.visalia.brightpearl.apiclient.http

Class RequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.visalia.brightpearl.apiclient.http.RequestBuilder

  • public class RequestBuilder
extends Object
    A builder used to create immutable Request instances.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Request build()
      Constructs the immutable Request instance.
      static RequestBuilder newRequest()
      Creates a new builder instance.
      RequestBuilder withBody(String body)
      Add a JSON body to a PUT or POST request.
      RequestBuilder withHeaders(Map<String,String> headers)
      Sets the map of unencoded headers to be added to the request.
      RequestBuilder withMethod(Method method)
      Sets the HTTP method of the request.
      RequestBuilder withParameters(Map<String,String> parameters)
      Sets the map of unencoded querystring parameters to be added to the URL.
      RequestBuilder withUrl(String url)
      Sets the full URL of the resource.

    • Method Detail

      • newRequest

        public static RequestBuilder newRequest()
        Creates a new builder instance. At minimum, a method and URL must be set.
        Returns:
        a new builder instance.

      • build

        public Request build()
        Constructs the immutable Request instance.
        Returns:
        a request instance for execution.

      • withMethod

        public RequestBuilder withMethod(Method method)
        Sets the HTTP method of the request.
        Parameters:
        method - HTTP method.
        Returns:
        builder instance for method chaining.

      • withUrl

        public RequestBuilder withUrl(String url)
        Sets the full URL of the resource.
        Parameters:
        url - full URL excluding querystring parameters.
        Returns:
        builder instance for method chaining.

      • withParameters

        public RequestBuilder withParameters(Map<String,String> parameters)
        Sets the map of unencoded querystring parameters to be added to the URL.
        Parameters:
        parameters - querystring parameters.
        Returns:
        builder instance for method chaining.

      • withHeaders

        public RequestBuilder withHeaders(Map<String,String> headers)
        Sets the map of unencoded headers to be added to the request.
        Parameters:
        headers - request headers.
        Returns:
        builder instance for method chaining.

      • withBody

        public RequestBuilder withBody(String body)
        Add a JSON body to a PUT or POST request.

        Returns:
        builder instance for method chaining.
